titleStmt.title: By His Highness. A proclamation for the better encouragement of godly ministers and others and their enjoying their dues and liberty according to lavv.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1658-1660 : R. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Richard, 1626-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness the Lord Protector, 1658. And are to be sold at the sign of the Seven Stars in Fleetstreet over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at White-Hall the twenty fifth day of November, in the year of our Lord God, one thousand six hundred fifty and eight.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Seven Stars in Fleetstreet over against Dunstans Church
